director.name: 梅尔文·布莱格 Melvyn Bragg

introduction: ITV Documentary about Mamma Mia!, the hit jukebox musical inspired by the music of ABBA. After premiering in London's West End in 1999, the show has gone on to achieve massive success around the world, having been seen by over 30 million people. Now, as a major film adaptation, the original musical's creative team, including ABBA members Bjorn Ulvaeus and Benny Andersson, talk about how the show has, in under ten years, become a global musical phenomenon.
